column5: Hey looks like Ma Nature came through last night and we'll have a white Christmas  Then in January.....C'Mon Spring
Great picture!  Merry Christmas to you as well  No snow down my way....although we may get flurries Christmas day....
Merry Christmas to you too bushart  We got about 1" of the white stuff here last night so at least it looks abit more like the season should !!
Merry Christmas to you as well CCMT and Lew
Merry Christmas Bushart  Got a foot of snow ending yesterday   I'm guessing most of my Canadian friends don't want to hear it. Love your artwork.   Always in good taste.
Thanks and Merry Christmas PS8 and Merky
